name: Venture Villa
subtitle: A comprehensive FullStack application providing the ultimate travel guide experience for exploring the wonders of Colombia.

name: ASCO Study Center
subtitle: React APP tailored for the SDPs at ASCO designed to facilitate knowledge acquisition and information access.

name: Group Awesome's Movie Generator
subtitle: Discover the world of cinema with ease. This app empowers you to access information on your favorite movies, check nearby theaters, and access showtime schedules.

name: Mealy App
subtitle: Stay organized and plan your meals efficiently with the Mealy App. Simplify your weekly meal scheduling for a stress-free dining experience.

name: Weather Dashboard
subtitle: Experience real-time weather updates for major and minor cities with this weather dashboard, powered by a third-party API.

name: Password Generator
subtitle: An essential tool for generating strong, randomized passwords. Ideal for employees seeking secure password creation.

name: Work Day Scheduler
subtitle: Simplify your day with this user-friendly calendar app. Plan and save events for each working hour from 9 am to 5 pm, boosting your productivity.

name: Note Taker APP
subtitle: A versatile application for jotting down and saving your notes, ensuring that your important thoughts and ideas are never lost.
